name: Stomp 2016
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Stomp is a 2- to 8-player Arena game without weapons. Players fight by stomping on each other.

Platform: PC / Engine: Unreal Engine 4
Number of players: 2 to 8

Producer : Jeoffrey GUILTAUX / Mathilde KALLENBRUNN
Game Design : Zakaria ABOUKHALID and Julien METZGER
Game Art : Vincent DOUZIECH, Mateo MANJON and Christina MOUA
Game Design & Programming : Aurélien PERRUCHOT
Game Programming : Valentin BAS
Music & Sound Design : Terence TOUSSAINT
